column3: Traffic;Battambang: A Virak Buntham hit a man at 11.30pm on 11th March on National Road 5 at Thnol Bor Te village
column4: Russey Keang district.------Police have not yet identified the man
column6: but he had a motorbike close to him.------The bus was travelling from Battambang. Phnom Penh and hit the victim who standing in the road and not riding the Honda Dream.------In a strange case
column8: the moto is unlikely to be the victims
column9: but it is suspected he had stolen it as the lock was broken.------Police are investigating the incident.------Kohsantepheap
